content: Is there a way to re-trigger a hook in the sandbox? (Previously, clicking on the hook name like "Patient View" at the top of the screen would re-trigger it.) I'll add a feature request if it's missing -- just wanted to make sure it's not user error on my part :-) Cc @Zach Plata @Kevin Shekleton

@Josh Mandel Clicking on the tab "Patient View" should re-trigger the hook call. For the Rx View, it will not re-trigger the call after re-clicking the tab unless a medication has been chosen. Is the second call to the patient-view sample CDS service not present on the network tab in devtools if you click the tab again?
I'll double check; I didn't see the UI updating when I clicked the "Patient View" linkz but I'm not sure whether the network request was issued.
